QuestData.Title: Void Ridge
QuestData.Description: We have to improve my warp rift generator. You must take it to Void Ridge. Head east of here. You must avoid the foul fort of Zeth'Gor. To the east beyond Zeth'Gor is a small pass through the mountains. Through this pass you will find Void Ridge, a terrible place on the edge of the abyss.$B$BYou must kill the walkers that you find there, and bring me shards of their souls. With their power we will improve upon the warp rift generator and open a portal to the beyond that cannot be closed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to Void Ridge and kill the creatures you find. Collect 40 Void Ridge Soul Shards and return them to Ogath the Mad in Spinebreaker Post.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have done it then? You have the shards that we need?
QuestData.RewardText: $BExcellent. the warp rift generator is almost complete. There is only one final ingredient we require. Soon we shall be able to open up a warp rift to the deepest parts of the abyss. $B$BWho knows what strange creature may come through? Think of it $N. the power such knowledge will bring is limitless.
